insert into myty_dengmi_temp
dm_mimian,
dm_mimu,
dm_midi,
dm_mimianzhu,
dm_midizhu,
dm_author,
dm_temp_id,

#{dmMimu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.sql: dm_mimian, dm_mimu, dm_midi, dm_mimianzhu, dm_midizhu, dm_author, dm_temp_id
DM_MIMIAN, DM_MIMU, DM_MIDI, DM_MIMIANZHU, DM_MIDIZHU, DM_AUTHOR, DM_TEMP_ID
mapper.select: select count(*) from myty_dengmi_temp where dm_author = #{dmAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from myty_dengmi_temp a left join myty_answer b on a.dm_temp_id = b.dm_id where a.dm_author = #{dmAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.user_id != #{dmAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into myty_dengmi_temp (dm_temp_id, dm_mimian, dm_mimu, dm_midi,dm_mimianzhu,dm_midizhu,dm_author) values
(#{item.dmTempId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dmMimian, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dmMimu, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dmMidi, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dmMimianzhu, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dmMidizhu, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dmAuthor, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update myty_dengmi_temp
dm_mimian = #{dmMimian, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dm_mimu = #{dmMimu, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dm_midi = #{dmMidi, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dm_mimianzhu = #{dmMimianzhu, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dm_midizhu = #{dmMidizhu, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dm_author = #{dmAuthor, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where dm_temp_id = #{dmTempId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select B.user_id,B.user_name, count(A.dm_mimian) as count from myty_dengmi_temp A left join myty_user B on A.dm_author = B.user_id group by A.dm_author
